layer_fluorescence.dat
========================

.. Note:: ``options.calc_vert_profiles`` & ``options.calc_fluor``

rows - time (simulation number)

columns - upward fluorescence per layer

.. list-table::
    :widths: 20 20 60

    * - variable
      - units
      - description
    * - **fluorescence**
      - W m-2
      - upward fluorescence per layer
